mapper.select: select t_board.board_id as board_id, count(board_reply_id) as reply_count, t_board.member_id as member_id, board_title, board_hit, board_recommend, board_regdate, board_tag_id, case when(board_tag_id=1) then '잡담' when(board_tag_id=2) then '공지' when(board_tag_id=3) then '캠핑팁' when(board_tag_id=4) then '상품후기' when(board_tag_id=5) then '캠핑후기' end as 'board_tag_name' from t_board left join t_board_reply on t_board.board_id = t_board_reply.board_id where board_deleteYN = 'N' and board_tag_id !=2 group by t_board.board_id order by t_board.board_hit DESC limit 0, 10;

select t_camping.camping_id as camping_id, count(camping_reply_id) as reply_count, t_camping.member_id as member_id, camping_title, camping_hit, camping_regdate, camping_region, camping_recruitment, camping_applicant, camping_departure, camping_period, camping_close from t_camping left join t_camping_reply on t_camping.camping_id = t_camping_reply.camping_id where camping_deleteYN = 'N' and camping_close = '진행중' group by t_camping.camping_id order by t_camping.camping_close DESC, t_camping.camping_id DESC limit 0, 8;
select draw_id, draw_title, product_img_url1, draw_event_end_date from t_draw where draw_deadline != '이벤트 마감' order by draw_id DESC;
